title: Hybrid and Online-Based Information Literacy Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Information Literacy and Understanding of Discipline/Job-Specific Terminology
context.additional_context: Students use personal digital devices to combine online modules with face-to-face workshops, completing tasks based on real-world language-related job scenarios.

learning_goals: Students apply criteria for evaluating the credibility of information sources with 80% or higher accuracy.
After analyzing a research topic, students systematically document critical thinking processes in a digital research notebook (template provided).
Students write an information utilization report incorporating peer feedback, identifying and explaining three or more issues encountered during the research process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
